challenge_place_5m.title: Simetrinin √áƒ±raƒüƒ±!
challenge_place_5m.description: GER√áEKLƒ∞K SENƒ∞N OYUN ALANIN! (5 Milyon Blok)

challenge_chop_5m.title: K√∂pek Jackson
challenge_chop_5m.description: En en iyi, iyi √ßocuk! (5 Milyon Blok)

bound_ender_peral.name: <white>Reliquary Portkey</white>
bound_ender_peral.usage2: <gray>Right Click to access the bound Inventory</gray>

bound_eye_of_ender.name: <white>Ocular Anchor</white>
bound_eye_of_ender.usage1: <gray>Right Click to consume and teleport to the bound location</gray>
bound_eye_of_ender.usage2: <gray>Shift + Left Click to bind to a block</gray>

bound_redstone_torch.name: <white>Redstone Remote</white>
bound_redstone_torch.usage1: <gray>Right Click to create a 1-Tick Redstone pulse</gray>
bound_redstone_torch.usage2: <gray>Shift + Left Click on a 'Target' Block to bind</gray>

bound_snowball.name: <white>Web Snare!</white>
bound_snowball.usage1: <gray>Throw to create a temporary web trap at the location</gray>

elevator_block.name: Elevator Block
elevator_block.usage3: Minimum of 2 air blocks between the elevators

adapt_menu.how_to_level_up: <red>Level up skills to increase your max power.</red>
adapt_menu.not_enough_power: <red>Not enough power! Each Ability Level costs 1 power.</red>

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Agility is the ability to move quick and fluidly in the face of obstacles.

architect.name: Architect
architect.description: Structures are the building blocks of the world. Reality is in your hands, yours to control.

axes.name: Axes
axes.description: <gray>Why chop down trees, when you could chop</gray> <italic><gray>things</gray></italic> <gray>instead, same end result!</gray>

brewing.name: Brewing
brewing.description: Double Bubble, Triple Bubble, Quadruple Bubble- I still cant put this potion into a cauldron

blocking.name: Blocking
blocking.description: Sticks and stones Won't break your bones, But a shield will.

crafting.name: Crafting
crafting.description: With no more pieces left to place, why not make another?

discovery.name: Discovery
discovery.description: As your perception expands, your mind unravels to discover that which you did not.

enchanting.name: Enchanting
enchanting.description: What are you going on about? Prophecies, visions, superstitious jibber-jabber?

herbalism.name: Herbalism
herbalism.description: I can't find any plants, but I can find some seeds and- is that... Weed?

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Hunting is about the journey not the outcome.

nether.name: Nether
nether.description: From the depths of the Nether itself.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description: Dwarves are the miners, but ive learned a thing or two in my time. IM SWEDISH

ranged.name: Ranged
ranged.description: Distance is the key to victory, and the key to survival.

rift.name: Rift
rift.description: The Rift is a caustic harness, but you have harnessed the harness.

seaborne.name: Seaborne
seaborne.description: With this skill, you may will the wonders of the water.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: The art of the unseen. Walk in the shadows.

taming.name: Taming
taming.description: The parrots and the bees... and you?

tragoul.name: TragOul
tragoul.description: Blood flows through the veins of the universe. Constricted by your hands.

chronos.name: Chronos
chronos.description: Wind the Clock of the universe, experience the flow. Break the clock, become it.

unarmed.name: Unarmed
unarmed.description: Without a weapon is not without strength.

armor_up.name: Armor Up
armor_up.description: Get more armor the longer you sprint!

super_jump.name: Super Jump
lore: <gray>Sneak + Jump to perform a Super Jump</gray>

wall_jump.name: Wall Jump
wall_jump.description: Hold shift while mid-air against a wall to wall latch & jump!
lore: <gray>Hold Sneak against wall mid-air to latch and jump</gray>

wind_up.name: Wind Up
wind_up.description: Get faster the longer you sprint!

elevator.name: Elevator
elevator.description: This allows for you to build an elevator to teleport vertically fast!
lore: <yellow>* </yellow><gray>Jump to go up, Sneak to go down</gray>

foundation.name: Magic Foundation
foundation.description: This allows for you to sneak and place a temporary foundation beneath you!
lore: <gray>Sneak in mid-air to create temporary blocks</gray>

glass.name: Silk-Touch Glass
glass.description: This allows for you to essentially prevent the loss of glass blocks when you break them with an empty hand!
lore: <green>+ </green><gray>Glass drops as item instead of breaking</gray>

wireless_redstone.name: Redstone Remote
wireless_redstone.description: This allows for you to use a redstone torch to toggle redstone, remotely!
lore: <yellow>* </yellow><gray>Shift + Left-click to bind, Right-click to pulse</gray>

placement.name: Builders Wand
placement.description: Allows for you to place multiple blocks at once to activate Sneak, and hold a block that matches your looking block and place! Keep in mind, you may need to move a tad to trigger bounding the boxes!
placement.need_blocks: <red>You need <green>{0}</green> blocks in your hand to place this</red>

chop.name: Axe Chop
chop.description: Chop down trees by right clicking the base log!
lore: <gray>Right-click base log to chop entire tree</gray>

log_swap.name: Lucy's Log-Swapper
log_swap.description: Change the flavor of logs in a Crafting Table!
lore: <gray>Craft: 8 Logs + 1 Sapling = 8 Logs of sapling type</gray>

drop_to_inventory.name: Axe Drop-To-Inventory
drop_to_inventory.description: When you break a block it teleports the item into your inventory
lore: <gray>Passive: Chopped items go directly to inventory</gray>

ground_smash.name: Axe Ground Smash
ground_smash.description: Jump, then crouch and smash all nearby enemies.
lore: <gray>Jump + Sneak with axe to ground smash</gray>

leaf_miner.name: Leaf-miner
leaf_miner.description: Allows you to break bulk leaves at once!
lore: <gray>Sneak + Mine leaves to break in bulk</gray>

wood_miner.name: Wood-miner
wood_miner.description: Allows you to break bulk wood at once!
lore: <gray>Sneak + Mine logs to break in bulk</gray>

super_heated.name: Super Heated Brew
super_heated.description: Brewing stands work faster the hotter they are.

darkness.name: Bottled Darkness
darkness.description: Not sure why you need this, but here you go!

haste.name: Bottled Haste
lore: <gray>Craft: Speed Potion + Amethyst Shard = Haste I (60s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Speed Potion + Amethyst Block = Haste II (30s)</gray>

absorption.name: Bottled Absorption
lore: <gray>Craft: Instant Heal + Quartz Block = Absorption II (30s)</gray>

fatigue.name: Bottled Fatigue
lore: <gray>Craft: Weakness Potion + Slime Ball = Fatigue I (30s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Weakness Potion + Slime Block = Fatigue II (15s)</gray>

hunger.name: Bottled Hunger
lore: <gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Rotten Flesh = Hunger I (30s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Weakness Potion + Rotten Flesh = Hunger II (15s)</gray>

nausea.name: Bottled Nausea
lore: <gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Brown Mushroom = Nausea I (16s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Crimson Fungus = Nausea II (8s)</gray>

blindness.name: Bottled Blindness
lore: <gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Ink Sac = Blindness I (30s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Glow Ink Sac = Blindness II (15s)</gray>

resistance.name: Bottled Resistance
lore: <gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Iron Ingot = Resistance I (60s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Awkward Potion + Iron Block = Resistance II (30s)</gray>

health_boost.name: Bottled Life
health_boost.description: When Maximum health is not enough...
lore: <gray>Craft: Instant Heal + Golden Apple = Health Boost I (120s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Instant Heal + Enchanted Apple = Health Boost II (120s)</gray>

decay.name: Bottled Decay
decay.description: Who knew Detritus would be so useful?
lore: <gray>Craft: Weakness Potion + Poisonous Potato = Wither I (16s)</gray>
<gray>Craft: Weakness Potion + Crimson Roots = Wither II (8s)</gray>

saturation.name: Bottled Saturation
saturation.description: Ya know... Im not even Hungry...
lore: <gray>Craft: Regen Potion + Baked Potato = Saturation I</gray>
<gray>Craft: Regen Potion + Hay Bale = Saturation II</gray>

chain_armorer.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
chain_armorer.description: Allows you to craft Chainmail Armor
lore: <gray>Craft: Use Iron Nuggets in armor patterns</gray>

horse_armorer.name: Craftable Horse Armor
horse_armorer.description: Allows you to craft Horse Armor

multi_armor.name: Multi-Armor
lore: <gray>Merge Elytra with Chestplate for dual functionality</gray>

deconstruction.name: Deconstruction
deconstruction.description: Deconstruct blocks & items into salvageable base components!

reconstruction.name: Ore Reconstruction
reconstruction.description: Recraft ores from their base components!

backpacks.name: A Boutilier's Backpacks!
backpacks.description: This just Brings the Mojang Bundle into the game!

stations.name: Portable Tables!
stations.description: Use a table in the palm of your hand!
lore: <red>- </red><gray>Items left inside are LOST when closed!</gray>

skulls.name: Craftable skulls!
skulls.description: Using Materials you can Craft Mob Skulls!
lore: <gray>Craft: Surround Bone Block with mob materials</gray>

armor.name: World Armor
armor.description: Passive armor depending on nearby block hardness.
lore: <gray>Passive: Gain armor from nearby hard blocks</gray>

unity.name: Experimental Unity
unity.description: Collecting Experience Orbs adds XP to random skills.
lore: <gray>Passive: XP orbs boost random Adapt skills</gray>

resist.name: Experimental Resistance
resist.description: Consume experience to mitigate the damage you take from all sources
lore: <gray>Passive: Spend XP to reduce incoming damage</gray>

villager.name: Villager Attraction
villager.description: Allows for you to get Better trades with villagers!

lapis_return.name: Lapis Return
lapis_return.description: At the cost of 1 more level of XP, and has a chance to give you free lapis in return

quick_enchant.name: Quick-Click Enchant
quick_enchant.description: Enchant items by clicking enchant books directly on them.
lore: <gray>Click enchant books directly on items to apply</gray>

return.name: XP Return
return.description: Enchanting XP is returned to you when you enchant an item.
lore: <gray>Passive: Chance to refund XP when enchanting</gray>

haste.name: Hasty Excavator
haste.description: This will speed up the excavation process, with HASTE!

spelunker.name: Super-Seeing Spelunker!
spelunker.description: See Ores with your eyes, but through the ground!
lore: <gray>Hold Ore in offhand + Glowberries in main hand + Sneak</gray>

drop_to_inventory.name: Shovel Drop-To-Inventory
drop_to_inventory.description: When you break a block it teleports the item into your inventory
lore: <gray>Passive: Dug items go directly to inventory</gray>

omni_tool.name: OMNI - T.O.O.L.
lore: <red>- </red><gray>Broken tools in the merge cannot be used</gray>

growth_aura.name: Growth Aura
growth_aura.description: Grow nature around you in an aura

hippo.name: Herbalist's Hippo
hippo.description: Consuming food, gives you more saturation

myconid.name: Herbalist's Myconid
myconid.description: Gives you the ability to craft Mycelium
lore: <gray>Craft: Any Dirt + Brown Mushroom + Red Mushroom</gray>

terralid.name: Herbalist's Terralid
terralid.description: Gives you the ability to craft Grass Blocks

cobweb.name: Webby Creator
cobweb.description: Gives you the ability to craft Cobwebs in a Crafting Table

mushroom_blocks.name: Mushroom Maker
mushroom_blocks.description: Gives you the ability to craft Mushroom Blocks in a Crafting Table

drop_to_inventory.name: Hoe Drop-To-Inventory
drop_to_inventory.description: When you break a crop it teleports the item into your inventory
lore: <gray>Passive: Harvested crops go directly to inventory</gray>

hungry_shield.name: Hungry Shield
hungry_shield.description: Take damage to your hunger before your health.
lore: <gray>Passive: Damage is absorbed by hunger first</gray>
<yellow>* </yellow><gray>Requires food in hunger bar to activate</gray>

luck.name: Herbalist's Luck
luck.description: When you break Grass/Flowers, you have a chance to get a random item
lore: <green>+ {0}</green> <gray>Chance to get an item from breaking flowers</gray>
<green>+ {1}</green> <gray>Chance to get an item from breaking grass</gray>

replant.name: Harvest & Replant
replant.description: Right click a crop with a hoe to harvest & replant it.
lore: <gray>Right-click crops with hoe to harvest and replant</gray>

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: Deal more damage the lower health you are (Melee)

lore: <red>-{0}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

drop_to_inventory.name: Items Drop-To-Inventory
drop_to_inventory.description: When you Kill something / Break a block With a sword it teleports the drops into your inventory
lore: <gray>Passive: Mob drops go directly to inventory</gray>

invisibility.name: Vanishing Step
invisibility.description: When you are struck you gain invisibility, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {4}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

jump_boost.name: Hunter's Heights
jump_boost.description: When you are struck you gain jump-boost, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

luck.name: Hunter's Luck
luck.description: When you are struck you gain luck, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {4}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

regen.name: Hunter's Regen
regen.description: When you are struck you gain regeneration, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

resistance.name: Hunter's Resistance
resistance.description: When you are struck you gain resistance, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

speed.name: Hunter's Speed
speed.description: When you are struck you gain speed, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

jumpboost.name: Hunter's Jump Boost
jumpboost.description: When you are struck you gain jump boost, at the cost of hunger
lore: <gray>Gain Jump Boost when struck by enemies</gray>
<green>+ {0}</green> <gray>Jump Boost stacks for 3 seconds on hit</gray>
<red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

strength.name: Hunter's Strength
strength.description: When you are struck you gain strength, at the cost of hunger
lore: <red>- {2}</red> <gray>Poison stacks if you run out of hunger</gray>

skull_toss.name: Wither Skull Throw
skull_toss.description: <gray>Unleash your inner Wither by using someone's head.</gray>
lore: <gray>Right-click with a Wither Skull to throw it</gray>

wither_resist.name: Wither Resistance
wither_resist.description: Resists withering through the power of Netherite.

fire_resist.name: Fire Resistance
fire_resist.description: Resists fire by hardening your skin.

auto_smelt.name: Autosmelt
auto_smelt.description: Allows you to smelt mined Vanilla ores
lore: <gray>Passive: Ores are automatically smelted when mined</gray>

chisel.name: Ore Chisel
chisel.description: Right Click Ores to Chisel more ore out of them, at a severe durability cost.

drop_to_inventory.name: Pickaxe Drop-To-Inventory
drop_to_inventory.description: When you break a block it teleports the item into your inventory
lore: <gray>Passive: Mined items go directly to inventory</gray>

vein_miner.name: Veinminer
vein_miner.description: Allows you to break blocks in a Vein/Cluster of Vanilla ores

arrow_recovery.name: Arrow Recovery
arrow_recovery.description: Recover Arrows after you have killed an enemy.

web_shot.name: Web Snare
web_shot.description: Surround cobwebs around your target when you hit them!
lore: <yellow>* </yellow><gray>Throw the crafted snowball to create a web trap</gray>

force_shot.name: Force Shot
force_shot.advancement_lore: Land a shot from over 30 blocks away!

lunge_shot.name: Lunge Shot
lunge_shot.description: While falling your arrows toss you in a random direction

arrow_piercing.name: Arrow Piercing
arrow_piercing.description: Adds Piercing to projectiles! Shoot through things!

remote_access.name: Remote Access
remote_access.description: Pull from the void, and get into a marked container.
lore: <yellow>* </yellow><gray>Shift + Left-click to bind, Right-click to access</gray>

blink.name: Rift Blink
blink.description: Short ranged instant teleportation, Just a blink away!

chest.name: Easy Enderchest
chest.description: Open an enderchest by Left-clicking it in your hand.
lore: <gray>Left-click with Enderchest in hand to open</gray>

descent.name: Anti-Levitation
descent.description: Are you tired of being stuck in the air? This is the skill for you!

resist.name: Rift Resistance
resist.description: Gain Resistance when using Ender Items & Abilities
lore: <gray>Passive: Gain Resistance when using Rift abilities or Ender items</gray>

visage.name: Rift Visage
visage.description: Prevents Endermen from becoming aggressive if you have Enderpearls in your inventory.
lore: <gray>Passive: Endermen ignore you when you carry Enderpearls</gray>

oxygen.name: Organic Oxygen Tank
oxygen.description: Hold more oxygen in your tiny lungs!

fishers_fantasy.name: Fisher's Fantasy
fishers_fantasy.description: Earn more XP from fishing, and get more fish!

haste.name: Turtle Miner
haste.description: While mining underwater you gain haste!

night_vision.name: Turtle's Vision
night_vision.description: While underwater, you gain Night Vision

dolphin_grace.name: Dolphin's Grace
dolphin_grace.description: Swim like a dolphin, without the dolphins

ghost_armor.name: Ghost's Armor
ghost_armor.description: Slow building armor when not taking damage, Lasts for 1 hit
lore: <gray>Passive: Build armor over time when not hit</gray>

snatch.name: Item Snatch
snatch.description: Snatch Dropped items instantly while sneaking!
lore: <gray>Sneak to pick up nearby items instantly</gray>

ender_veil.name: Enderveil
ender_veil.description: No more Pumpkins to prevent Enderman attacks

bloody_blade.name: Bloody Blade
bloody_blade.description: Strikes with your sword, cause Bleeding!
lore: <gray>Sword strikes cause bleeding damage over time</gray>

poisoned_blade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisoned_blade.description: Strikes with your sword, cause Poison!

damage.name: Tame Damage
damage.description: Increase your tamed animal damage dealt.
lore: <gray>Passive: Your tamed animals deal more damage</gray>

health.name: Tame Health
lore: <gray>Passive: Your tamed animals have more health</gray>

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Reflect damage back to your attacker!

globe.name: Globe of Pain
globe.description: Divide the Damage you deal based on the number of enemies around you!
lore: <green>+ {1}</green> <gray>Bonus damage to all entities in range</gray>

healing.name: Will of Pain
healing.description: Regain health based on the damage you deal!
lore: <gray>Heal from the damage you deal to enemies</gray>

lance.name: Corpse Lances
lance.description: Killing an enemy or having an ability kill an enemy, spawns a lance that deals damage to a nearby enemy!
lore: <gray>Kills spawn lances that seek nearby enemies</gray>

glass_cannon.name: Glass Cannon
glass_cannon.description: Bonus Unarmed Damage the lower your armor value is
